name: Shelf Maniac
description:
Student made game with Unreal Engine 5 for 2022 Epic MegaJam - Theme: As above so below

Your mission is to get out of the house! Solve puzzle in each room to make your way closer to getting out.

Controls: 

  • WASD = Move  
  • Spacebar = Jump
  • Mouse = Look around
  • Left mouse button  = Drag  / Release item 
  • Right mouse button = Throw item
